languages.text: "Повелители наши, магосы премудрые, об нас заботятся. Кажный месяц платим им за охрану каплей крови, а они из нее зелья варят, что на выродков указывают. Поручения ихние волшебные мы выполняем исправно, а магосы за то приказывают ирригационным комплексам родить вдвое против прежнего".

"Our good masters, the wise Magi, they take care of us. Every month, we give 'em a drop of blood as payment for protecting us, and they use it to brew potions that can detect freaks. We do whatever mystical tasks they require of us, and for that, the Magi order the irrigation facilities to yield twice as much."
languages.original_text: "Повелители наши, магосы премудрые, об нас заботятся. Кажный месяц платим им за охрану каплей крови, а они из нее зелья варят, что на выродков указывают. Поручения ихние волшебные мы выполняем исправно, а магосы за то приказывают ирригационным комплексам родить вдвое против прежнего".

traits.locale_text: "Our good masters, the wise Magi, they take care of us. Every month, we give 'em a drop of blood as payment for protecting us, and they use it to brew potions that can separate decent folk from freaks. We do whatever mystical tasks they require of us, and for that, the Magi order the irrigation facilities to yield twice as much."

"Our good masters, the wise Magi, they take care of us. Every month, we give 'em a drop of blood as payment for protecting us, and they use it to brew potions that can separate decent folk from freaks. We do whatever mystical tasks they require of us, and for that, the Magi order the irrigation facilities to yield twice as much."

"Our good masters, the wise Magi, they take care of us. Every month, we give 'em a drop of blood as payment for protecting us, and they use it to brew potions that can detect freaks. We do whatever mystical tasks they require of us, and for that, the Magi order the irrigation facilities to yield twice as much."

We do whatever mystical tasks they require of us, and for that, the Magi order the irrigation facilities to yield twice as much."

We do whatever mystical tasks they require of us, and for that, the Magi order the irrigation facilities to yield twice as much."

"Our good masters, the wise Magi, they take care of us. Every month, we give 'em a drop of blood as payment for protecting us, and they use it to brew potions that can detect freaks. We do whatever mystical tasks they require of us, and for that, the Magi order the irrigation facilities to yield twice as much."

languages.text: “我们那些善良的主人，那些聪明的贤者，他们相当照顾我们。他们保护我们，而我们每个月都会给他们一滴血，作为保护我们的报酬。他们会用我们的血来制造药水，可以检查出我们之中谁是怪物。那些贤者要求我们做那些神秘兮兮的任务，我们做好之后，他们就会让那些灌溉设施加倍干活。”
languages.original_text: "Our good masters, the wise Magi, they take care of us. Every month, we give 'em a drop of blood as payment for protecting us, and they use it to brew potions that can detect freaks. We do whatever mystical tasks they require of us, and for that, the Magi order the irrigation facilities to yield twice as much."

traits.locale_text: “我们那些善良的主人，那些聪明的贤者，他们相当照顾我们。他们保护我们，而我们每个月都会给他们一滴血，作为保护我们的报酬。他们会用我们的血来制造药水，可以检查出我们之中谁是怪物。那些贤者要求我们做那些神秘兮兮的任务，我们做好之后，他们就会让那些灌溉设施加倍干活。”

languages.text: 「私達の主人、知的な賢人。彼らはよく私達の面倒を見てくれています。私達を守ってくれる代償として、毎月血液を一滴あげています。怪物を発見する為のポーション作りに、使われているらしいです。どんな謎多き任務でも、頼まれたらやっています。その代わりに、賢人は灌漑施設に2倍の収穫を命じるんです」
languages.original_text: "Our good masters, the wise Magi, they take care of us. Every month, we give 'em a drop of blood as payment for protecting us, and they use it to brew potions that can detect freaks. We do whatever mystical tasks they require of us, and for that, the Magi order the irrigation facilities to yield twice as much."

traits.locale_text: 「私達の主人、知的な賢人。彼らはよく私達の面倒を見てくれています。私達を守ってくれる代償として、毎月血液を一滴あげています。怪物を発見する為のポーション作りに、使われているらしいです。どんな謎多き任務でも、頼まれたらやっています。その代わりに、賢人は灌漑施設に2倍の収穫を命じるんです」

languages.text: «Nuestros amables señores, los Magos, cuidan de nosotros. Cada mes les damos una gota de sangre en pago por su protección y ellos la usan para elaborar pociones para detectar monstruos. Hacemos cualquier labor mística que nos piden y a cambio los Magos hacen que las instalaciones de riego produzcan el doble».
languages.original_text: "Our good masters, the wise Magi, they take care of us. Every month, we give 'em a drop of blood as payment for protecting us, and they use it to brew potions that can detect freaks. We do whatever mystical tasks they require of us, and for that, the Magi order the irrigation facilities to yield twice as much."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestros amables señores, los Magos, cuidan de nosotros. Cada mes les damos una gota de sangre en pago por su protección y ellos la usan para elaborar pociones para detectar monstruos. Hacemos cualquier labor mística que nos piden y a cambio los Magos hacen que las instalaciones de riego produzcan el doble».

languages.text: "Unsere gütigen Meister, die weisen Magi, sie kümmern uns um uns. Jeden Monat geben wir ihnen einen Tropfen Blut als Bezahlung für ihren Schutz, und sie brauen daraus Tränke, die Freaks entdecken können. Wir führen alle mystischen Aufgaben auf, die sie uns auftragen, und dafür befehlen die Magie den Bewässerungsanlagen, doppelt so viel zu geben."
languages.original_text: "Our good masters, the wise Magi, they take care of us. Every month, we give 'em a drop of blood as payment for protecting us, and they use it to brew potions that can detect freaks. We do whatever mystical tasks they require of us, and for that, the Magi order the irrigation facilities to yield twice as much."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere gütigen Meister, die weisen Magi, sie kümmern uns um uns. Jeden Monat geben wir ihnen einen Tropfen Blut als Bezahlung für ihren Schutz, und sie brauen daraus Tränke, die Freaks entdecken können. Wir führen alle mystischen Aufgaben auf, die sie uns auftragen, und dafür befehlen die Magie den Bewässerungsanlagen, doppelt so viel zu geben."

languages.text: « Nos bons maîtres, les sages magos, ils prennent bien soin de nous. Tout ce qu'on a à faire pour qu'ils nous protègent, c'est leur donner un peu de sang tous les mois, et eux, ils s'en servent pour préparer des potions qui détectent les monstres. Des fois, on accomplit aussi des tâches mystiques à leur demande, et après, ils ordonnent aux systèmes d'irrigation de produire deux fois plus. »
languages.original_text: "Our good masters, the wise Magi, they take care of us. Every month, we give 'em a drop of blood as payment for protecting us, and they use it to brew potions that can detect freaks. We do whatever mystical tasks they require of us, and for that, the Magi order the irrigation facilities to yield twice as much."

traits.locale_text: « Nos bons maîtres, les sages magos, ils prennent bien soin de nous. Tout ce qu'on a à faire pour qu'ils nous protègent, c'est leur donner un peu de sang tous les mois, et eux, ils s'en servent pour préparer des potions qui détectent les monstres. Des fois, on accomplit aussi des tâches mystiques à leur demande, et après, ils ordonnent aux systèmes d'irrigation de produire deux fois plus. »

languages.text: "Yüce efendilerimiz, bilge Magoslar bize iyi bakıyor. Biz korumalarının karşılığı, her ay kanımızdan bir damla veriyoruz. Onlar da ucubeleri tespit eden iksirler üretiyor. Aklımız ermese de bir dediklerini iki etmiyoruz. Karşılığında da Magoslar, sulama tesislerini iki misli çalıştırıyor."
languages.original_text: "Our good masters, the wise Magi, they take care of us. Every month, we give 'em a drop of blood as payment for protecting us, and they use it to brew potions that can detect freaks. We do whatever mystical tasks they require of us, and for that, the Magi order the irrigation facilities to yield twice as much."

traits.locale_text: "Yüce efendilerimiz, bilge Magoslar bize iyi bakıyor. Biz korumalarının karşılığı, her ay kanımızdan bir damla veriyoruz. Onlar da ucubeleri tespit eden iksirler üretiyor. Aklımız ermese de bir dediklerini iki etmiyoruz. Karşılığında da Magoslar, sulama tesislerini iki misli çalıştırıyor."
